title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
instructions: Cook spaghetti. Fry bacon. Mix eggs and cheese. Combine all ingredients together.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Grilled chicken cooked in a creamy tomato-based sauce.
instructions: Grill chicken. Prepare sauce. Mix together and simmer.
